trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que exibe dados hierárquicos em uma estrutura de árvore que contém itens que você pode expandir e recolher.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, que significa que ele pode conter uma coleção de objetos de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a classe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um simples <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de TreeView](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "ilustração de TreeView")

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls that can contain rich content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> controls.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> são <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles que podem conter conteúdo formatado, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> can contain one or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects as its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> pode conter um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objetos como seus descendentes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is defined as a hierarchy of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> é definido como uma hierarquia de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> pode preencher sua árvore associação a uma fonte de dados e usando <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Examples of data sources include <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de fontes de dados <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Exibir um grande número de itens pode causar problemas de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [otimizando o desempenho: controles](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: To improve the performance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, consulte [como: melhorar o desempenho de um modo de exibição de árvore](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> , consulte o [visão geral de TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> has a limited number of levels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> tem um número limitado de níveis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeView Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle TreeView

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade a vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controles, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, consulte [modelos e estilos de TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade estiver presente em ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle do modelo padrão e é definido usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> to expand.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> a ser expandido.

trans-unit.source: Expands the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> control and all its child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Expande o controle especificado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> e todos seus elementos filho <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> and all its child elements were expanded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> especificado e todos seus elementos filho foram expandidos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> to use to display content.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> a ser usado para exibir conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> to use as a container for content.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> a ser usado como contêiner de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> pode rolar.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" /> because the control has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="true" /> porque o controle tem um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> no seu estilo.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is its own container or can be its own container.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o item especificado é seu próprio contêiner ou pode ser seu próprio contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="item" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="item" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Defines an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> event when the keyboard focus changes for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> quando o foco do teclado é alterado para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event that occurs when there is a change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classe para um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> que ocorre quando há uma alteração na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` if one of the following keys is pressed together with the CTRL key:
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação define <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true` se uma das seguintes chaves é pressionada junto com a tecla CTRL:

trans-unit.source: Provides the item that was previously selected and the item that is currently selected for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um item selecionado anteriormente e o item selecionado atualmente para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" /> event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" /> quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento que o parâmetro `e` fornece contém um <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é definido como o item tiver sido selecionado ou está definido como `null` se não houver nenhum item selecionado anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> está definida para o item selecionado recentemente ou é definido como `null` se nenhum novo item é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected item in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item selecionado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The selected object in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O objeto selecionado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> ou <see langword="null" /> se nenhum item for selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control is a read-only property and is set to an item when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property value of the item <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle é uma propriedade somente leitura e é definido como um item quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> valor de propriedade do item <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing Strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to specify an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como especificar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property that is the specified by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade que é especificada pelo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" /> para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that is specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade especificado pelo <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" /> para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> ou <see langword="null" />, se nenhum item for selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> propriedade especifica o caminho para a propriedade que é usado para determinar o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> é associado a uma coleção de objetos do tipo `Employee`, que tem duas propriedades chamadas `EmployeeName` e `EnployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> para exibir o valor de `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> e defina <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> para `"EmployeeNumber"` ter <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> retornar o valor de `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> propriedade é uma propriedade somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of a selected item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor de um item selecionado em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> that uses a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property to the `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> que usa um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> para exibir o `EmployeeName` e `EmployeeWorkDay` propriedades de um `Employee` e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> propriedade para o `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: When you select an `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> is set to the `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você seleciona um `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> é definido como o `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that is used to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" /> of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho usado para obter o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem" /> em uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path that is used to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho usado para obter o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> propriedade especifica o caminho para a propriedade que é usado para determinar o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> é associado a uma coleção de objetos do tipo `Employee`, que tem duas propriedades chamadas `EmployeeName` e `EnployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> para exibir o valor de `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> e defina <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> para `"EmployeeNumber"` ter <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> retornar o valor de `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> that uses a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property to the `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> que usa um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> para exibir o `EmployeeName` e `EmployeeWorkDay` propriedades de um `Employee` e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> propriedade para o `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: When you select an `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> is set to the `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você seleciona um `EmployeeName` no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> é definido como o `EmployeeNumber`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue" />.
